headline: Sell Lam Research Stock, Analyst Says. There Are Doubts About Growth.
summary: After a big rally in  Lam Research’s  stock price, Morgan Stanley says investors can find better opportunities elsewhere.  On Sunday, analyst Shane Brett lowered his rating for Lam Research stock to Underweight from Equal-weight.  “We aren’t confident about NAND [flash memory market] and China growth into 2026,” he wrote.

headline: Vicor (VICR) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of power conversion and control solutions provider Vicor Corporation (NASDAQ:VICR) fell 1.8% in the afternoon session after the major indices continued to retreat (Nasdaq -1.5%, S&P 500 -1.2%) amid profit-taking and renewed concerns about tariffs. The decline was not unique to Vicor, as the wider technology sector faced significant downward pressure. This sector-wide slump appears to be driven by a combination of investor profit-taking, following a strong year-to-date performance for chip

headline: Why Lam Research (LRCX) Stock Is Falling Today
summary: Shares of semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) fell 4.5% in the afternoon session after Morgan Stanley downgraded the stock to 'Underweight' from 'Equal-Weight', citing concerns over a future slowdown in growth.

headline: Bernstein Raises PT on Lam Research Corporation From $95 to $105, Keeps Outperform Rating
summary: Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) is one of the 12 Best Semiconductor Equipment Stocks to Buy Right Now. On August 26, Bernstein raised the price target on Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) from $95 to $105, keeping its Outperform rating on the stock. Stacy Rasgon from Bernstein increased the price target on LRCX following strong Q4 FY2025 […]
